content: 10 sts total repeat row 10-13 once for a total of 32 row row 15 ws *p to m sm p1 sm* repeat from * to * 4 times in total p rem sts size 8 work row 6-13 a total of 3 times for a 53 59 61 65 65 69 69 71 71 full row total of 24 row 272 300 332 368 396 424 468 496 524 sts size 9 skip row 6-9 and only work row 10-13 a total of 6 times for a total of 24 row 40 44 49 55 60 64 70 75 79 each front sts 54 60 66 72 76 82 92 96 102 each sleeve sts 80 88 98 110 120 128 140 150 158 back sts row 6 rs *k to m m1r sm k1 sm m1l* repeat from * to * 4 times in total k rem sts if doing sa proceed to next page front sleeves and back increase d by 8 sts total neckline join w/out sa row 7 9 ws *p to m sm p1 sm* repeat from * to * 4 times in total p rem sts joining round yo *k to m m1r sm k1 sm k to m sm k1 sm m1l* repeat from * to * 2 times in total k row 8 rs k1 m1r *k to m m1r sm k1 sm till 1 st rem m1l* repeat from * to * 4 times in total k to 1 st rem m1l k1 front and back increase d by 4 sts total neckline front sleeves and back increase d by 10 sts total with the last st and yo made at the start of the round do a ssk place borm row 10 rs *k to m m1r sm k1 sm m1l* repeat from * to * 4 times in total k rem sts work round 1 a total of 4 5 4 3 3 3 3 3 4 times front sleeves and back increase d by 8 sts total round 1 *k to m m1r sm k1 sm k to m sm k1 sm m1l* repeat from * to * 2 times in total k rem sts row 11 ws *p to m sm p1 sm* repeat from * to * 4 times in total p rem sts front and back increase d by 4 sts total row 12 rs k1 m1r *k to m m1r sm k1 sm work round 2 a total of 3 1 0 0 0 1 1 0 1 m1l* repeat from * to * 4 times in total k to 1 st time s rem m1l k1 round 2 no increase *k to m sm k1 sm* repeat from * to * neckline front sleeves and back increase d by 10 sts total 4 times in total k rem sts row 13 ws *p to m m1lp sm p1 sm m1rp* 61 66 66 69 69 74 74 75 77 full row/rnds repeat
